content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Terms of Use for the Esplanade Oleander Ltd. Website

All content published on this website is subject to copyright protection. Unauthorised use of any part of the website or its content shall be deemed copyright infringement and is subject to legal proceedings. Access to this website and the information contained herein are subject to the terms and conditions specified. After loading the homepage, any further use shall be deemed consent to the following legal conditions:

Interpretation, application, and legal effects of the use of this network site are subject to the laws of the Republic of Croatia. Esplanade Oleander Ltd. shall not be liable for legal effects that the website may cause in other countries where the user accesses the content, and shall deem that access is carried out voluntarily and with the user’s liability.

Unauthorised use of information for commercial purposes as well as their distribution to any third parties is not permitted. Information about products and services from this website are deemed accurate at the time of their entry, with the possibility of deviation from veracity at the moment of user’s access. Esplanade Oleander Ltd. shall not be held liable for any business or private decisions, damage, loss, or expense of any kind made on the basis of information from this website. We reserve the right to change website information at any time without prior notice.

It is strictly prohibited to reproduce, copy, or distribute photographs, designs, content, offers, and logos without explicit permission in writing from Esplanade Oleander Ltd., except for personal use in accordance with all copyright and proprietary rights.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
